com.betabot.script.wrappers

Class RSInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betabot.script.api.MethodProvider
      • com.betabot.script.wrappers.RSInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<RSComponent>

    public class RSInterface
extends MethodProvider
implements java.lang.Iterable<RSComponent>
    Represents an interface. Each interface consists of a group of components.
    Author:
    Qauters

        public java.awt.Point getLocation()
        Gets the screen location of the interface.
        Returns:

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Finds all the text in it, searches all his children for it.
        Returns:
        all the text found separated by newlines, empty if null
